resources.string: Associates should be able to process packages more quickly and recipients should be able to pick them up faster. This app also makes the process paperless, which saves the department money.
How is this app better than the old process?

At the Operations and Receiving office of the UIUC Mechanical Engineering Department, the process for processing packages is unnecessarily tedious. The associate must label a package, fill out an entry in the package log book, and email the recipient. Once a person arrives to pick up a package, the associate must search for the package manually and hand over the package. This app aims to make the whole process more efficient.
What is the purpose of this app?
Welcome to the S&R Package Processing App!
What can you do in this app?
In this app, you can process a package, check out a package, and search for a package using keywords or package ID.

When you process a package, its information is stored into a database in this app. Once the recipient picks up the package, the information for that package will update in the database, indicating that the package has been picked up.
This app was developed in Android Studio. The languages used were Java, XML, and SQLite.
